title: PvP Fatal Error
body:
What is this? Whats wrong with my client?? D:
It tells me that i have to re-install?
Why? can someone explain

Idk if you guys can see the pic that i tried to upload of the problem but it just says this

*:-( You may need to REPAIR your install.
(Bootstrap Error)
Boot sequence failed: LoadLegacyResourcesActionError #2124*

replies.body:
That is a very old error message. It came with a picture of Amumu, right?

There's no modern explanation as to how to fix that problem nowadays. Your best course of action is probably to reinstall League entirely, restart and all. Be sure to back up your item sets and "Config" folder.
